ADVERSE REACTIONS
Hydergine (r) (ergoloid mesylates) preparations have not been found to produce serious side effects. Transient nausea and gastric disturbances have been reported. Hydergine (r) (ergoloid mesylates) preparations do not possess the vasoconstrictor properties of the natural ergot alkaloids.

PRECAUTIONS
Practitioners are advised that because the target symptoms are of unknown etiology, careful diagnosis should be attempted before prescribing Hydergine (r) (ergoloid mesylates) preparations.
